description: Track uptime and receive alerts when the system is not working as planned. Atlas System monitors SQL Server, Windows, Ubuntu, websites, and tcp connections. Supposed LDAP and SAML sso authentication.
long_description: Track uptime and receive alerts when the system is not working as planned. Atlas System monitors SQL Server, Windows, Ubuntu, websites, and tcp connections. Supposed LDAP and SAML sso authentication.
name: System
short_description: Simple system monitor for servers, databases, and websites.
